1690750.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 4
1690750.description:
The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 4

By: The Griffon's Saddlebag
These 50 unique niche-filling weapons and items are flavorful, balanced, and ready for you and your players to enjoy. These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.

Features

As a Griffon's Saddlebag product, you can expect the following benefits:
  • Low-Prep Setup.
    Metadata tagging, along with identified and unidentified item handouts, save you hours of prep time.
  • Ledger.
    All items come listed on a single sheet for ease of access, and includes simple instructions for use.
  • Professional Art.
    The Griffon's Saddlebag's art bring life to every item with remarkable attention to detail.
  • Fine Attunement.
    These items have been rigorously reviewed for balance and are fully-ready for use in your games.
Included items:

  • Bath Potion
  • Companion's Band
  • Dryadleaf
  • Firecracker Crystals
  • Grass Carpet
  • Seat Belt
  • Snugglebeast
  • Uorik the Conqueror's Juice Cup
  • Vox Helm
Uncommon
  • Amulet of Equilibrium
  • Battle Tax
  • Boots of the Cloud Jumper
  • Dragon's Call
  • Ear Cuff of the Vampire Bat
  • Frefil's Tiny Tasty Tongue Twisty Sugarbombs
  • Inferno Rope
  • Liar's Lyre
  • Otyugh Cloak
  • Petal Dancer Ward
  • Relentless Bulwark
  • Ring of Seething
  • Shielded Turtle Sugarbombs
  • Snugglebeast
Rare

  • Battlebrew Maul
  • Brooch of Many Sizes
  • Festerwood Claymore
  • Greaves of Dendallen
  • Helmsman's Shelter
  • Knight's Standard of Virtue
  • Leeching Quarterstaff
  • Mageplate Cap
  • Mirrorlight Edge
  • Monocle of Clarity

  • Signet Rings of Blindness, Deafness, and Silence
  • Sling of the Tiny Giant
  • Staff of the Mirage
  • Snugglebeast
  • Sword of Resonance
  • Volcanic Boots

Very Rare
  • Arcanist's Bowstaff

  • Circlet of the Huntsman's Third Eye

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Ryan Yingling, and Griffon Macaulay
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
